Address.label: Address
Address.value: 1301 AVENUE OF THE AMERICAS,37TH FLOOR, NEW YORK, New York, 10019, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: MidCap Financial Investment Corp is an externally managed, publicly traded, Business Development Company, focused on providing senior debt solutions to middle market companies. The company's investment strategy is primarily investing in loans originated by MidCap Financial, as well as MidCap Financial's prominent role in Apollo's Direct Origination and broader Yield businesses.
